title: yogurt CSS
desc: A colossal low-level utility CSS framework for crafting beautiful and elegant user interface at an atomic level without writing a single line of CSS.

title: Performance-X
desc: Accelerate page load, enhance the image and video color, anti-aliased typography, and more for Chrome, Chrome OS and other Chrome-based web browsers.

title: krugurt.js
desc: A lightweight front-end toolkit to craft elegant and beautiful functional html-based MVP project. Comes with PWA and archirecture-free Sigmoid Neural Network out of the box.

title: equilibrium
desc: Lightweight low-level time machine backup utility for Linux

title: golem-cli
desc: App manager for GOLEM to install, delete or kill apps in Terminal

title: golem-sdk
desc: Software development kit to craft GOLEM apps out of thin air

title: scarv
desc: NumPy binary search engine for HTML-based scientific documentation that over hundered of page. A dream come true for static page.

title: defreeze
desc: Surpress hogging processrs, limit cpu core per PID, eliminates freezing and smoothing entire Linux system.

title: lyft
desc: A tool for migrating settings and data from one Linux installation to another. It can be used while re-installing the operating system, and when moving to next release of a Linux distribution.

title: blackhole
desc: Super lightweight and insanely fast download accelerator for Terminal.

title: arch-primitive-ion
desc: Ultra high performance network relay + ionizer + 3x acceleration for embedded system (commercially obsolete).
